About Amar Asom

The Amar Asom is an Assamese daily regional newspaper published by G. L. Publications Ltd. It was established on April 21, 1995, and is being simultaneously published from Guwahati, Jorhat, and North Lakhimpur. It has a wide network of correspondents covering each and every corner of the state of Assam. The average circulation number of Amar Asom is 70,434. Amar Asom has established itself as one of the most credible newspapers in Assam owing to its unbiased reporting. The newspaper publishes latest news on national and Global affairs, sports, business, entertainment, technology, education, science, health etc.
